title: Pura Kiki 9oz/260 ml Stainless Steel Insulated Bottle w/Silicone Straw & Sleeve, 100% Plastic-Free, MadeSafe Certified, 100% Medical-Grade Silicone Straw for Kids, Toddlers, Babies & Infant – Aqua
features: WHY PURA? Pura focuses on safety, durability, ease of use, and eco-progressive consumption. Our revolutionary design not only eliminates plastic components but provides much-improved functionality. We are the first and only line of plastic-free toddler bottles that have achieved the MADESAFE Certified rating. Plus, our One Life… One Bottle systems, which allow any lid to fit any bottle through every life stage, are a great way to help save our planet and help rid our oceans of waste.

MULTI-USE TODDLER SIPPY CUP AND KIDS WATER BOTTLE: This toddler water bottle with straw easily transforms into an infant bottle, sippy cup, sport/water bottle, or a snack container by simply swapping the straw out for another Pura silicone lid. Baby Grows...Bottle Evolves

TOXIN-FREE FEEDING AND HYDRATION SYSTEM: Innovative valved silicone straw with removable silicone internal tube for ease of use; can be used with or without an internal tube. Includes soft silicone travel cover and bright colored SWIRL sleeve

WE PUT KIDS SAFETY AND SUSTAINABILITY FIRST: We free people from an ever-increasing plasticized world, keep petroleum-based plastics out of our kids' mouths, create repurpose-able solutions that are infinitely superior to single-use or recyclable offerings, and do it all in a fun, modern, and colorful way.

MIX AND MATCH BOTTLES, LIDS, SLEEVES, AND ACCESSORIES: All products are compatible with other Pura silicone components and accessories. We ensure there is no need to discard and replace your bottles as your child matures. Limited Lifetime Warranty
description: The Pura Kiki Insulated straw cup features a double-wall vacuum Insulated stainless steel bottle (18/8), and medical grade silicone components including straw, travel cover, and sleeve. Like all bottles in the Pura Kiki collection, the Pura Insulated straw cup contains zero plastic parts! The included silicone straw features a two-piece design with an internal silicone straw that may be separated from the mouth piece for easy cleaning. The silicone mouth piece of the straw may be used with or without the included internal silicone straw. The straw offers a very fast flow. Ideal for children 6 months to 4 years, this straw cup is compatible with all silicone components from Pura including our Natural Vent Nipples in various flow rates, silicone XL Sipper Spout, sealing disks, and sports top. Each cup has pressed internal volume marks that can be clearly viewed on the inside of the bottle for easy measuring. The bottle is also compatible with nipples and spouts from other brands. With Pura you can rest assured that you are always using the safest and most eco-progressive bottle on the market. One Life…One Bottle
